Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataBase

    public class DataBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataBase
    The database that stores the news article and the terms in them.
    Author:
    Ji Xiayan
